definitions
'license' means this cern-ohl-p.

'source' means information such as design materials or digital code which can be applied to make or test a product or to prepare a product for use,conveyance or sale,regardless of its medium or how it is expressed. it may include notice.
'covered source' means source that is explicitly made available under this license.
'product' means any device,component,work or physical object,whether in finished or intermediate form,arising from the use,application or processing of covered source.
'make' means to create or configure something,whether by manufacture,assembly,compiling,loading or applying covered source or another product or otherwise.

'notice' means copyright,acknowledgement and trademark notice,references to the location of any notice,modification notice (subsection 3.3(b)) and all notice that refer to this license and to the disclaimer of warranties that are included in the covered source.
'licensee' or 'you' means any person exercising rights under this license.

'licensor' means a person who creates source or modifies covered source and subsequently conveys the resulting covered source under the terms and conditions of this license. a person may be a licensee and a licensor at the same time.
'convey' means to communicate to the public or distribute.
